description: A pillar of Polo style since it was first introduced, the oxford shirt is a versatile staple. This version is cut for a relaxed fit and finished with our multicolored signature Pony.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 34" back body length, a 22" shoulder, a 62¼" chest, and a 37" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Size Tall 2L has a 36" back body length, a 22½" shoulder, a 62¼" chest, and a 39" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Long sleeves with buttoned barrel cuffs.
Split back yoke with a box pleat ensures a comfortable fit and a greater range of motion.
Multicolored signature embroidered Pony at the left chest.
